title: How to level up on boards
body:
hi
how to level on boards

replies.body: I don't get it either. My in-game level has been lvl 30 for 2 years and I'm still level 5 on boards.
It can take a moment for your account to sync up to the boards when posting for the first time.  Everything looks okay now!
Your Boards level is tied to your in-game level, sometimes they don't sync but by posting or upvoting / downvoting a post, they will.
